def attach_policy(role_name, policy_arn): """ Attaches a policy to a role.
:param role_name: The name of the role. **Note** this is the name, not the ARN. :param policy_arn: The ARN of the policy. """ try: iam.Role(role_name).attach_policy(PolicyArn=policy_arn) logger.info("Attached policy %s to role %s.", policy_arn, role_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't attach policy %s to role %s.", policy_arn, role_name) raise
